channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man admits in TV interview to killing and burying his parents
item.description: A man admitted to killing and burying his parents eight years ago in the backyard of their upstate New York home during a television interview this week, then was arrested as he left the studio.

item.title: Transportation Department tightens noncitizen truck driver rules after fatal crash in Florida
Tennessee governor says more federal agents to join fight against crime in Memphis next week
